title: Six Steps to Excellence In Ministry
description: Why settle for adequate when you can be first-rate? There is no shortage of ministers who desire to achieve excellence. But only a few dare to demand it of themselves. In this clear call for action, Kenneth Copeland shows how to turn that inner desire into a firm decision to be all that God has called you to be. No matter what area of God’s service you’re in, don’t stop short of these Six Steps to Excellence in Ministry.
author: Kenneth Copeland
